title: When more women make decisions, the environment wins

title_detail.value: When more women make decisions, the environment wins

summary: When more women are involved in group decisions about land management, the group conserves more - particularly when offered financial incentives to do so, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: When more women are involved in group decisions about land management, the group conserves more - particularly when offered financial incentives to do so, according to a new study.
